content:
<rule id="quarkus-resteasy-multipart-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>

                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="resteasy-multipart-provider" groupId="org.jboss.resteasy"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration over="default">
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'resteasy-multipart-provider' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-resteasy-multipart' extension">
                        <message>
                            Replace the `org.jboss.resteasy:resteasy-multipart-provider` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-multipart`  
                            Further information in the link below.
                        </message>
                        <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/rest-json#multipart-support" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                    </hint>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
